column5: Hello fellow fishermen and women!  Although I have been a part of these forums for a while, I thought I would post an introduction!  I am based out of Mississauga and fish several times a week for a variety of species!  I have been fishing all my life (since I can hold a rod) and have accumulated my fair share of fishing specific gear, from ice fishing to centerpin to fly to casting!
I look forward to your tall Pole stories. Welcome to OFC.
